attributes.action: Raise minumum wage for under 25's aswell as over 25's
attributes.additional_details: I recently recieved a payrise at work because i was the only one being paid less than my colleagues soley based on age, other under 25's are not as lucky as me and they deserve justice
attributes.background: An 18 year old will be paid less than a 25 year old for doing the same job this is a direct violation of the equality act 2010 because age is a protected characteristic
